Body:
Description: We are still unable to get new Windows clients to register to the internal virtual appliance. We made a new msi installer with the updated server name, after the certificate install, and that test also failed to register.

We have msi log files of the installation, but can not determine why the new PCs are not registering in the portal.

What We've Learned Updated: the client registration certificate was enabled by accident since they were not using a certificate for this.
while disabling it, the custom server certificate was reset.
the customer will re-add it and let me know if there are any other issues
Next Steps Updated: waiting for the customer to let me know everything is good with the server certificate and close the ticket or set up another meeting
